ValidationRule.description: When tracking create, delete, and undelete, a parent record is required or records will be orphaned.
ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: AND( ISNULL(Parent_Object__c), OR( Track_Create__c, Track_Delete__c , Track_Undelete__c ))
ValidationRule.errorMessage: A Parent object must be defined to track create, delete, and undelete.
